name: corridor-width
description:
width of the corridor and the units of the width value

The width value represents the whole width of the corridor where
the trajectory supplied in the `coords` query parameter is the centre
point of the corridor

`corridor-width={width}/{units}`

e.g.  corridor-width=100/m

Would be a request for a corridor 100m wide with the coords parameter values being the centre point of the requested corridor, 
the request would be for data values 50m either side of the trajectory coordinates defined in the coords parameter. 

The width units supported by the collection will be provided in the API metadata responses
